creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: portrait of bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man seated holding folded handkerchief or paper in PR hand which is resting on PR thigh; blurry line of trees in distance with blurry, clouds and blue sky above; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
title: Nineteen Lincolns
